LanguageData.ResurrectHeavyMech.label: resurrect heavy mechanoid
LanguageData.ResurrectHeavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly mechanoid of the heavy weight class. So long as the mechanoid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.ResurrectLightMech.label: resurrect light mechanoid
LanguageData.ResurrectLightMech.description: Resurrect a friendly mechanoid of the light weight class. So long as the mechanoid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.ResurrectMediumMech.label: resurrect medium mechanoid
LanguageData.ResurrectMediumMech.description: Resurrect a friendly mechanoid of the medium weight class. So long as the mechanoid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.ResurrectUltraheavyMech.label: resurrect ultraheavy mechanoid
LanguageData.ResurrectUltraheavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly mechanoid of the ultraheavy weight class. So long as the mechanoid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
